DOCNAME: CASE OF ORLOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained that they had been denied an opportunity to appear in person before the court in the civil proceedings to which they were parties .
